pages.text: All instruments in MIMI can hold a $(l:overview_switchboard)Switchboard$() which allows the instrument to connect to a FileCaster and accept inputs from a System MIDI Input Device.$(br2)The inserted Switchboard is retained in the instrument after the GUI is closed (and dropped by Block Instruments when they are broken).

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: Instruments use the following $(l:switchboard_properties)Switchboard Properties$():$(br2)- Linked FileCaster$(br)- MIDI Channels
